title: Bug 2940: Export Zip: Update of checkboxes should use a busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip: The checkboxes in the table take a long time (around 30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state. A busy cursor should be shown during this time.
OB: The checkboxes in the table take a long time (around 30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state.
EB: A busy cursor should be shown during the update process of the checkboxes in the table.
SR: 1. Open the Export Zip feature. 2. Observe the time it takes to update the checked state of the checkboxes. 3. Verify if a busy cursor is shown during this process.
